verses.verse: Wine <S%H3196><s%> is a <S%H3887>mocker<s%>, strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> a <S%H1993>brawler<s%>; And whosoever <S%H7686>erreth<s%> thereby is not <S%H2449>wise<s%>.

The <S%H367>terror<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is as the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion<s%>: He that provoketh him to <S%H5674>anger<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> against his own <S%H5315>life<s%>.
It is an <S%H3519>honor<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> to keep aloof from <S%H7379>strife<s%>; But every <S%H191>fool<s%> will be <S%H1566>quarrelling<s%>.
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> will not <S%H2790>plow<s%> by reason of the <S%H2779>winter<s%>; Therefore he shall <S%H7592>beg<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and have nothing.
Counsel <S%H6098><s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is like <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>; But a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> will draw it <S%H1802>out<s%>.
Most <S%H7230><s%> <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his own <S%H2617>kindness<s%>; But a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> who can <S%H4672>find<s%>?
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%>, <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are his <S%H1121>children<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>.
A <S%H4428>king<s%> that sitteth <S%H3427>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1779>judgment<s%> Scattereth <S%H2219>away<s%> all <S%H7451>evil<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Who can <S%H559>say<s%>, I have made my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2135>clean<s%>, I am <S%H2891>pure<s%> from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>?
Diverse <S%H68>weights<s%>, and diverse <S%H374>measures<s%>, <S%H8147>Both<s%> of them <S%H1571>alike<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Even a <S%H5288>child<s%> maketh himself <S%H5234>known<s%> by his <S%H4611>doings<s%>, Whether his <S%H6467>work<s%> be <S%H2134>pure<s%>, and whether it be <S%H3477>right<s%>.
The <S%H8085>hearing<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%>, and the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> even both of <S%H8147>them<s%>.
Love <S%H157><s%> not <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, let thou come to <S%H3423>poverty<s%>; <S%H6491>Open<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
It is <S%H7451>bad<s%>, it is <S%H7451>bad<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H7069>buyer<s%>; But when he is <S%H235>gone<s%> his <S%H1984>way<s%>, then he boasteth.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H6443>rubies<s%>; But the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> are a <S%H3366>precious<s%> <S%H3627>jewel<s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6148>surety<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>; And hold him in <S%H2254>pledge<s%> that is surety for <S%H5237>foreigners<s%>.
Bread <S%H3899><s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet<s%> to a <S%H376>man<s%>; But <S%H310>afterwards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2687>gravel<s%>.
Every <S%H4284>purpose<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6098>counsel<s%>; And by wise <S%H8458>guidance<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> thou <S%H4421>war<s%>.

He that goeth <S%H1980>about<s%> as a <S%H7400>tale-bearer<s%> <S%H1540>revealeth<s%> <S%H5475>secrets<s%>; Therefore <S%H6148>company<s%> not with him that <S%H6601>openeth<s%> wide his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Whoso <S%H7043>curseth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%>, His <S%H5216>lamp<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%> in <S%H380>blackness<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
An <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> may be gotten <S%H926>hastily<s%> at the <S%H7223>beginning<s%>; But the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof shall not be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> not <S%H7999>thou<s%>, I will recompense <S%H7451>evil<s%>: Wait <S%H6960>for<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and he will save <S%H3467>thee<s%>.
Diverse <S%H68>weights<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And a <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.
A <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H4703>goings<s%> are of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; How then can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>?
It is a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3216>rashly<s%> to <S%H6944>say<s%>, It is holy, And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> to make <S%H1239>inquiry<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2219>winnoweth<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, And <S%H7725>bringeth<s%> the <S%H212>threshing<s%> -wheel over them.
The <S%H5397>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2664>Searching<s%> all his <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%>.
Kindness <S%H2617><s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>; And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H5582>upholden<s%> by <S%H2617>kindness<s%>.
The <S%H8597>glory<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> is their <S%H3581>strength<s%>; And the <S%H1926>beauty<s%> of old <S%H2205>men<s%> is the hoary <S%H7872>head<s%>.
Stripes <S%H2250><s%> that <S%H6482>wound<s%> <S%H8562>cleanse<s%> away <S%H7451>evil<s%>; And <S%H4347>strokes<s%> reach the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%>.
